desc: Bespoke handmade jewellery that is uniquely yours! Ivy&I creates exceptional and one-of-a-kind pieces with a personal touch. Fine jewellery hand-crafted with meaning and destined to be passed down for generations.

layout.text: Bespoke jewellery that is uniquely yours. More than just an accessory, each Ivy&I piece is designed and hand-crafted for their future wearer, alive with meaning and destined to be passed down for generations.
